T02D2792:156a-0: @156a * // dpal 'jig rten mgon po dug thams cad 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2792:156a-1: dpal ldan rdo rje can gyis slob ma'i snying gi dug sbyang ba //
T02D2792:156a-2: 'jig rten gsum mgon rtag pa mchog / rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par bya //
T02D2792:156a-3: lnga phud rgyal pa rnam lnga bdag / spyan ras gzigs dpal sngar byas na //
T02D2792:156a-4: rdo rje slob dpon rdo rje che //
T02D2792:156a-5: rnam dag rdo rje 'bar ba'i dbus //
T02D2792:156a-6: legs gzhag shin tu dangs pa yis //
T02D2792:156a-7: mchod pa kun gyis rab tu mchod //
T02D2792:156a-8: de'i mthar yi ge bzhis brgyan pa //
T02D2792:156a-10: snying gi mun pa sel mdzad ni //
T02D2792:156a-11: dran pa'i rgyas gdab mkhas pas bsgom //
T02D2792:156a-12: skye bo thibs po thams cad la //
T02D2792:156a-13: brtse chen rlung bskyod ye shes me //
T02D2792:156a-14: aa phreng sogs bcas phyogs kun du //
T02D2792:156a-15: spro zhing bsdu bas don gnyis bsgrub //
T02D2792:156a-17: thugs kar 'od zer gsum rim gyis //
T02D2792:156a-18: ye shes mkha' 'gro bkug nas ni //
T02D2792:156a-19: gsang sngags 'gog pas bzlas par bya //
T02D2792:156a-20: sngags las skyes dang sku las skyes //
T02D2792:156a-21: 'od zer las skyes aa phreng gis //
T02D2792:156a-22: ji srid slob dpon sku gang pa //
T02D2792:156a-23: de srid ma yengs brtson par bya //
T02D2792:156a-24: nam zhig snyid la dga' bas khyab //
T02D2792:156a-25: ba spu gyen 'gro mchi ma g-yo //
T02D2792:156a-26: sems la ting 'dzin rang byung ba //
T02D2792:156a-27: de nas bdag lus kun khyab bya //
